name: Untitled Rewind Game (ude_games, RafD)
description:
Untitled Rewind Game

You are John, you were a normall person before you found a device crafted by alliens that allows you to travel back in time.You decided to go back in time and help as many people as you can!

The game was made for the Brackeys 2020.2  game jam in 7 days.
